title: Advanced Analytics Dashboard
description: Comprehensive analytics with charts, trends, and detailed insights into feedback patterns and user engagement metrics.

title: Real-time Collaboration
description: Enable team members to collaborate on feedback items with comments, mentions, and live updates.

title: API Integration Platform
description: Connect with popular tools like Slack, Jira, and Trello to streamline workflow integration.

title: Mobile Application
description: Native iOS and Android apps for managing feedback on the go with push notifications and offline support.

title: AI-Powered Categorization
description: Automatically categorize and tag feedback using machine learning to improve organization and insights.

title: White-label Solution
description: Customizable branding options for enterprise clients to match their brand identity and domain.
